body_html:
Main feature would be a dynamic functions loading from remote sources (eq. /google/ functions).

For example: compiled kernels can be loaded straight from /ipfs/<hash> address, this would require an ipfs function loader.

The idea is mainly to provide tools to develop new kinds of neurons.
body_text:
Main feature would be a dynamic functions loading from remote sources (eq. /google/ functions).
For example: compiled kernels can be loaded straight from /ipfs/<hash> address, this would require an ipfs function loader.
The idea is mainly to provide tools to develop new kinds of neurons.
body:
Main feature would be a dynamic functions loading from remote sources (eq. `/google/` functions).

For example: compiled kernels can be loaded straight from `/ipfs/<hash>` address, this would require an `ipfs` function loader.

The idea is mainly to provide tools to develop new kinds of neurons.
